pages.text: $(l:resources/elemental_soil)Aqueous soil$() automatically harvests all crops that grow on it, when they are eligible to be harvested.$(br2)Drops are either deposited directly on the soil, or, if there is a space below the soil, into that location (allowing for automation with water, hoppers, etc).$(br2)$(info) This functionality can be disabled by planting gravel directly below the soil.
